import React from 'react'; import './About.css'; export default function About() { return (

About Us

Dear Parents,

Thank you for considering Montessori education for your child. RDreamz Montessori was conceived from my own experience as a Montessori Directress for the past 12 years. I am quite aware of the importance of balancing the needs of child, parent, and neighbouring community. To meet your family’s needs, we offer a unique, Montessori curriculum to choose from. We are integrating parent education opportunities into our enrichment centre agenda as well.

It is a wise goal for parents to seek out the best fit between child and centre. It is equally important to be certain that a centre can realistically deliver a parent’s educational goals and personal values to a child. Learn what a Montessori school should be like, then observe the children work!

In this centre of excellence, there will be trained Montessori staff who also meets our requirements. There will be a full range of Montessori materials. The children will be busy, happy, and kind. Choose carefully, as your child will be entering a second family. You should feel in harmony with centre’s ambience and practice.

Trust your eyes, ears, instinct, and personal experience.

Thank you.
Sincerely,
Ms Rekha, Montessori Directress

About Ms Rekha

B.SC, MBA(India), DMME (London), PDECCA(Singapore), DEC (Australia)

Ms Rekha is the founder and mentor of this Enrichment Centre. She received her Montessori Diploma from MMI (Modern Montessori Institute) London in 2013, with trainers who worked directly with Dr. Maria Montessori for over 20 years. Her Early Childhood Education was completed at KLC Singapore in 2016.

Since 2004, she has prepared and tutored students on Montessori education across Singapore, Malaysia, Philippines, Thailand, and India.

); }
